Interface GenericDao<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>

public interface GenericDao<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>
extends org.synyx.hades.dao.GenericDao<T,PK>

Generic Dao that can manage any kind of entities. Extends Hades GenericDao.

See Also:
